title: NHS hospitals trialling 15-minute blood test for life-threatening conditions in children
description: An innovative 15-minute blood test which can fast-track the diagnosis of children with potentially life-threatening conditions is being trialled by the NHS this winter. title: Fire station vaccine pop-ups to extinguish flu ‘wildfire’
description: Parents will be able to get their children protected against flu at a fire station this half term, as the NHS ramps up its winter vaccine campaign next week. description: Two of England’s leading doctors have set out their recommendations following the first phase of a review into postgraduate medical training. title: NHS to roll out first long-acting injection to prevent HIV
description: Around 1,000 people at risk of HIV will be offered a new long-acting injection on the NHS if they cannot have pills to protect them from the virus.
